name: World Wide Talent Search LLC
tag_list: talent, search, world, entertainment, music, modeling, model, dance, dancers, dancing, singing, rap, hip-hop, rb, prospects, talented, managment
overview:
Our Mission: To provide support, and empower aspiring talent to have healthy careers inside the new music and entertainment business. World Wide Talent Search is committed to working inside of the new paradigm of music and entertainment to help clients in the serious advancement of their careers.

World Wide Talent Search is a company born from the mind of David Peterson. David is an entrepreneur in the rapidly changing music and entertainment industry. David envisions being able to help artists and entertainers alike. In order to establish long-standing careers in entertainment, David believes that his clients must be diverse and highly marketable He looks to help his clients develop and hone their talents,skills, and brand.

World Wide Talent Search LLC was formed in August of 2008. The company began when David Peterson discovered the talent that a local entertainer possessed. He struck up initial conversation with the music artist and the two decided that it was long-standing entertainment careers that each wanted to pursue. David combines a college education in Advertising and Design Technology with a few years hands-on business and marketing experience from a nationally recognized corporation in the US.

Our policy is to show all of our clients the utmost respect and maintain an unprecedented level of professionalism which helps us to retain them.

milestones.description: Donny B. Lord signs with World Wide Talent Search LLC
